name: Child's Play CCG
description:
Welcome to the world of Child's Play! Here you will encounter many unique, wacky characters, and use your cards to best them in battle! Rules are easy to learn, but hard to master. Collect cards and heroes to improve your deck as you improve your skill.

Features:
- Simple yet strategic card game
- 100 heroes to collect
- 450 cards to collect
- 21 bosses to defeat
- Hundreds of interesting strategies to build!
